description: Cold Spring, N.Y., is a great place for New Yorkers to easily escape the big city.
title: A Cute Town on the Hudson
title_page: A Cute Town on the Hudson - The New York Times
text:
A visit to Cold Spring, N.Y., a short train ride north of Manhattan, is the perfect way for New Yorkers to flirt with small-town America but still be home before midnight. West Point, background, lies just across the Hudson River.
Robert Stolarik for The New York Times
